attributes.additional_details:
Age of children sharing a room.
If you have a child aged 11 and a toddler (both same sex) how can the 11 year old be expected to share with the stresses of sats and the work load from high school, when getting disturbed sleep due to the toddler, which effects the 11 year old's school life through tiredness.
This age needs to be reduced from 16 to 10 so as not to affect the child's education
